results.title: Simvastatin inhibits TGFbeta1-induced fibronectin in human airway fibroblasts
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ dose-dependently suppressed @GENE_FN1 @GENE_2335 @@@fibronectin@@@ abundance in non-@<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic@@@ fibroblasts.

citations.NLM: Schaafsma D, McNeill KD, Mutawe MM, Ghavami S, Unruh H, Jacques E, Laviolette M, Chakir J, Halayko AJ. Simvastatin inhibits TGFbeta1-induced fibronectin in human airway fibroblasts Respir Res. 2011 Aug 24;12(1):113. PMID: 21864337

results.title: Statins enhance the anti-inflammatory effects of inhaled corticosteroids in asthmatic patients through increased induction of indoleamine 2, 3-dioxygenase.
results.text_hl: METHODS: After a 2-week run-in period without treatment, 50 @<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were treated with 200 mug of @CHEMICAL_Budesonide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019819 @@@budesonide@@@ and randomly assigned to either 10 mg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or matched placebo for 8 weeks.

citations.NLM: Maneechotesuwan K, Ekjiratrakul W, Kasetsinsombat K, Wongkajornsilp A, Barnes PJ. Statins enhance the anti-inflammatory effects of inhaled corticosteroids in asthmatic patients through increased induction of indoleamine 2, 3-dioxygenase. results.title: Evaluation of Simvastatin and Bone Marrow-Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cell Combination Therapy on Airway Remodeling in a Mouse Asthma Model.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Four groups of @CELLLINE_CVCL:0184 @@@BALB/c@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ were studied including control group (animals were not sensitized), @DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@ group (animals were sensitized by @GENE_SERPINB1_PS1 @GENE_282665 @@@ovalbumin@@@), @DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (@<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic@@@ animals were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@), and @DISEASE_Asthma @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@ + @CELLLINE_CVCL:B6BB @@@BMSC@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group (@<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic@@@ animals were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and BMSCs).

citations.NLM: Mohammadian M, Sadeghipour HR, Kashani IR, Jahromi GP, Omidi A, Nejad AK, Golchoobian R, Boskabady MH. Evaluation of Simvastatin and Bone Marrow-Derived Mesenchymal Stem Cell Combination Therapy on Airway Remodeling in a Mouse Asthma Model. Lung. 2016 Oct;194(5):777-85. PMID: 27161569

results.title: Anti-inflammatory mechanism of simvastatin in mouse allergic asthma model.
results.text_hl: In this study we aimed to investigate the inhibitory mechanism of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Drug_Hypersensitivity @DISEASE_MESH:D004342 @@@allergic@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic symptoms@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Allergic asthma aggravated atherosclerosis increases cholesterol biosynthesis and foam cell formation in apolipoprotein E-deficient mice.
results.text_hl: These results indicate that @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ biosynthesis is increased during acute @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ uptake and foam cell formation is increased during advanced @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ administration significantly ameliorated the @DISEASE_Aortic_Root_Aneurysm @DISEASE_MESH:D000094628 @@@aortic root lesion@@@ size of @<m>DISEASE_Status_Asthmaticus</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013224 @@@asthmatic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ and significantly decreased @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_15357 @@@HMGCR@@@ and CD36 expression.

citations.NLM: Gao S, Wang C, Li W, Shu S, Zhou J, Yuan Z, Wang L. Allergic asthma aggravated atherosclerosis increases cholesterol biosynthesis and foam cell formation in apolipoprotein E-deficient mice. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2019 Nov 19;519(4):861-867. PMID: 31558320
